lead_paragraph: The committee’s chairman has said that he wants Mrs. Clinton to testify a second time, about the use of a personal email account.

headline.main: Hillary Clinton Offers to Appear Soon, but Only Once, Before House Panel on Benghazi
headline.print_headline: Clinton Offers to Appear Soon, but Only Once, Before House Panel on Benghazi

snippet: The committee’s chairman has said that he wants Mrs. Clinton to testify a second time, about the use of a personal email account.
